verses.text: These \add are\add* the words of the covenant , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses to make with the children of Israel in the land of Moab , beside the covenant which he made with them in Horeb. \p

¶ And Moses called unto all Israel , and said unto them, Ye have seen all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did before your eyes in the land of Egypt unto Pharaoh , and unto all his servants , and unto all his land ;
The great temptations which thine eyes have seen , the signs , and those great miracles :
Yet the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not given you an heart to perceive , and eyes to see , and ears to hear , unto this day.
And I have led you forty years in the wilderness : your clothes are not waxen old upon you, and thy shoe is not waxen old upon thy foot.
Ye have not eaten bread , neither have ye drunk wine or strong drink : that ye might know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God.
And when ye came unto this place , Sihon the king of Heshbon , and Og the king of Bashan , came out against us unto battle , and we smote them:
And we took their land , and gave it for an inheritance unto the Reubenites , and to the Gadites , and to the half tribe of Manasseh.
Keep therefore the words of this covenant , and do them, that ye may prosper in all that ye do. \p
¶ Ye stand this day all of you before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God ; your captains of your tribes , your elders , and your officers , \add with\add* all the men of Israel ,
Your little ones , your wives , and thy stranger that \add is\add* in thy camp , from the hewer of thy wood unto the drawer of thy water :

That thou shouldest enter into covenant with the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , and into his oath , which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God maketh with thee this day :  +  r 29.12  t enter: Heb. pass *

That he may establish thee to day for a people unto himself, and \add that\add* he may be unto thee a God , as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers , to Abraham , to Isaac , and to Jacob.
Neither with you only do I make this covenant and this oath ;
But with \add him\add* that standeth here with us this day before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God , and also with \add him\add* that \add is\add* not here with us this day :
(For ye know how we have dwelt in the land of Egypt ; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by ;
And ye have seen their abominations , and their idols , wood and stone , silver and gold , which \add were\add* among them:)\f + \fr 29.17 \ft idols: Heb. dungy gods\f*

Lest there should be among you man , or woman , or family , or tribe , whose heart turneth away this day from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God , to go \add and\add* serve the gods of these nations ; lest there should be among you a root that beareth gall and wormwood ;\f + \fr 29.18 \ft gall: or, a poisonous herb: Heb. rosh\f*

And it come to pass, when he heareth the words of this curse , that he bless himself in his heart , saying , I shall have peace , though I walk in the imagination of mine heart , to add drunkenness to thirst :\f + \fr 29.19 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*\f + \fr 29.19 \ft drunkenness…: Heb. the drunken to the thirsty\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will not spare him, but then the anger of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and his jealousy shall smoke against that man , and all the curses that are written in this book shall lie upon him, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall blot out his name from under heaven.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall separate him unto evil out of all the tribes of Israel , according to all the curses of the covenant that are written in this book of the law :\f + \fr 29.21 \ft are: Heb. is\f*

So that the generation to come of your children that shall rise up after you, and the stranger that shall come from a far land , shall say , when they see the plagues of that land , and the sicknesses which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath laid upon it;\f + \fr 29.22 \ft which…: Heb. wherewith the \+nd LORD\+nd* hath made it sick\f*

\add And that\add* the whole land thereof \add is\add* brimstone , and salt , \add and\add* burning , \add that\add* it is not sown , nor beareth , nor any grass groweth therein, like the overthrow of Sodom , and Gomorrah , Admah , and Zeboim , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* overthrew in his anger , and in his wrath :
Even all nations shall say , Wherefore hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* done thus unto this land ? what \add meaneth\add* the heat of this great anger ?

Then men shall say , Because they have forsaken the covenant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of their fathers , which he made with them when he brought them forth out of the land of Egypt :

For they went and served other gods , and worshipped them, gods whom they knew not, and \add whom\add* he had not given unto them:\f + \fr 29.26 \ft whom he…: or, who had not given to them any portion\f*\f + \fr 29.26 \ft given: Heb. divided\f*
And the anger of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was kindled against this land , to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book :
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* rooted them out of their land in anger , and in wrath , and in great indignation , and cast them into another land , as \add it is\add* this day.

The secret \add things belong\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God : but those \add things which are\add* revealed \add belong\add* unto us and to our children for ever , that \add we\add* may do all the words of this law.
